welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cimahi, Indonesia! Get ready to be charmed by our city's beautiful green landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Cimahi has to offer.

restaurants.name: Chung Gi Wa (청기와)
restaurants.description: Chung Gi Wa (청기와) is a korean restaurant located in Bandung.
restaurants.address: Leumah Neundeut (Jl. Surya Sumantri), Bandung, Jawa Barat

restaurants.name: Westhoff
restaurants.description: Westhoff is a bakery located in Bandung.
restaurants.address: Setrasari Mall (Jl. Ir. Sutami), Bandung, Jawa Barat

restaurants.name: Raja Rasa
restaurants.description: Raja Rasa is a seafood restaurant located in Bandung.
restaurants.address: Jl. Setra Ria No. 1 (Setra Sari), Bandung, Jawa Barat

restaurants.name: Puri Bambu
restaurants.description: Puri Bambu is a chinese restaurant located in Bandung.
restaurants.address: Jl. Sindang Sirna No. 14, Bandung, Jawa Barat

restaurants.name: Javan Steak & Pasta
restaurants.description: Javan Steak & Pasta is a steakhouse located in Bandung.
restaurants.address: Jl. Gegerkalong Hilir No.38, Bandung, Jawa Barat

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal for domestic and international flights, mainly used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
